scripts.install: npm run bower && npm run update-webdriver
scripts.pretest: npm run serve-start && npm run selenium-start
scripts.test: { npm run jshint && npm run jscs && npm run karma && npm run protractor-standalone; } 2>/dev/null
scripts.posttest: npm run serve-stop && npm run selenium-stop
scripts.test-nokarma: { npm run jshint && npm run jscs; } 2>/dev/null
scripts.serve-stop: if [ -f ionic.pid ]; then kill `cat ionic.pid`; rm ionic.pid; fi;
scripts.selenium-stop: if [ -f selenium.pid ]; then kill `cat selenium.pid`; rm selenium.pid; fi;
scripts.protractor: set -o pipefail && node_modules/protractor/bin/protractor test/protractor.config.js | grep -vE '  at .*(node_modules|\(timers.js)'
scripts.protractor-standalone: set -o pipefail && node_modules/protractor/bin/protractor test/protractor.standalone.config.js | grep -vE '  at .*(node_modules|\(timers.js)'
